title: Angler armor
summaries: Angler armor is an armor set consisting of the Angler Hat, Angler Vest, and Angler Pants. Each piece of the set provides a 5% increase to Fishing Power and can be received as a reward for completing fishing quests given by the Angler. The hat is given at 10 quests completed, the vest piece at 15, and the pants at 20. Although its effects on fishing are useful throughout the game, it only rewards a total of 4 defense.
Wearing the full set provides a set bonus which reduces enemy spawn rates.

statistics.Sell: 3 (set)
